Code: EXEC SQL UPDATE SEGUROS.seguros.v0endosso SET BCOCOBR = :BCOCOBR, AGECOBR = :AGECOBR, DACCOBR = :DACCOBR, COD_USUARIO = :COD_USUARIO, DATA_LIBERACAO = :DATA_LIBERACAO, OCORR_ENDERECO = :OCORR_ENDERECO, AGERCAP = :AGERCAP, TIMESTAMP = CURRENT TIMESTAMP WHERE NUM_APOLICE = :NUM_APOLICE AND NRENDOS = :NRENDOS END SQL
